channel.title: Solved: Little help with run server?
channel.description:
Well around 3 years ago I started developing an rsc server but went to uni and forgot about it, now I'm on my placement year I figured I'd have another little play.
I no longer have old machine and all of that was lost and I'm now working with windows 7.
I've downloaded a source etc and set up my paths but I'm getting these errors below when I try to runserver. (Clients work fine)
http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/641/prob1r.png
http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/825/prob2.png
Hope someone can help!
Downgraded to java 6 andall worked fine :s

item.title: Solved: Little help with run server?
item.dc:creator: @Anton Anton
item.description:
@Anton wrote:

Yeah the build.xml only occurs when i run as administrator.

The prob1 image shows what happens when I run normally.

Everything seems to compile OK and returns no errors :s

Read full topic
item.source: Solved: Little help with run server?

item.title: Solved: Little help with run server?
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

Dis you go to your server folder and looked for the build.xml file? It just looks like it is missing.

I attached it anyway, hope it helps.

Read full topic
